about_the_game:
You've dodged the music; Now it's time to dance (or chill) to the Soundodger 2 Soundtrack. Featuring 15 musicians and over 40 tracks, there's a little something for everyone.

Returning Favorites

Several artists from the first Soundodger+ have again joined the team to bring all-new tracks to celebrate a game about music:
  • Austin Wintory
  • Bean
  • Bill Kiley
  • Disasterpeace
  • MOWUKIS

New Sounds To Dodge

With an even bigger and better sequel, we had to make the soundtrack just the same. Joining the Soundodger artist family is a colorful cast of talented folks bringing some new flavor to the dish:
  • 81.0x19
  • azure aster
  • Graham Kartna
  • Julie Buchanan
  • nitsua
  • Occams Laser
  • Popskyy*
  • Sferro*
  • tiasu
  • turingsghost
*artists were previously in Soundodger+ DLC, but not the main game

name: Soundodger 2 Soundtrack
short_description: Bounce and vibe to the incredible Soundodger 2 Soundtrack, a collection of over 40 original and licensed tracks from musicians all over the world. From breakneck drum'n'bass to ethereal lo-fi to acoustic beatboxing, you'll have trouble deciding on a favorite.
